member.name: M:Azure.DataProtection.Provider.Kds.DstsProtector.ClearKeyCache
member.summary: Clears the cache of keys kept on the filesystem.

member.name: M:Azure.DataProtection.Provider.Kds.DstsProtector.Initialize(Azure.DataProtection.Model.IDstsSubjectNameIdentityConfig,Azure.DataProtection.Model.RegisterProviderFlags)
member.summary: Initialize the dSTS provider and use a subject name/issuer-based dSTS client identity when authenticating to the dKDS service.
member.param: The that describes how to authenticate to the dKDS service.
The flags to specify the initialization behavior.
member.exception: The dSTS protector could not be initialized successfully.

member.name: M:Azure.DataProtection.Provider.Kds.DstsProtector.Initialize(Azure.DataProtection.Model.IDstsIdentityConfig,Azure.DataProtection.Model.RegisterProviderFlags)
member.summary: Initialize the dSTS provider and use a certificate-based dSTS client identity when authenticating to the dKDS service.

member.name: M:Azure.DataProtection.Provider.Kds.DstsProtector.Initialize(Azure.DataProtection.Model.IManagedServiceIdentityConfig,Azure.DataProtection.Model.RegisterProviderFlags)
member.summary: Initialize the dSTS provider and use a dSTS managed service identity (MSI) when authenticating to the dKDS service.

member.name: M:Azure.DataProtection.Provider.Kds.DstsProtector.Initialize(Azure.DataProtection.Model.RegisterProviderFlags)
member.summary: Initialize the dSTS provider and use the executing user's Windows credentials when authenticating to the dKDS service.
